SearchListSpec.Name: Interaction by RFC2822 Message-Id search
SearchListSpec.Description: This provides the ability to search for interactions saved from Outlook.
SearchListSpec.Author: Breast Cancer Care Development

SPSearchList.common:CreateProcedureSQL: create procedure dbo.USP_SEARCHLIST_OUTLOOK_INTERACTION_TAG ( @MESSAGEID nvarchar(500) = null, @NAME nvarchar(500) =null, @MAXROWS smallint = 500 ) as select top(@MAXROWS) MESSAGEID, INTERACTIONID ID, from dbo.USR_OUTLOOK_INTEGRATION_TAG where (MESSAGEID = @MESSAGEID) order by MESSAGEID asc
